TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit UnsubscribeType extends ExchangeWebServices.BaseRequestType

Docs.summary: The class represents a request to end a pull notification subscription.

remarks.para: We recommend that you intentionally end a subscription instead of letting a subscription time out.

example.para: The following example shows you how to end a single subscription.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: The constructor initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SubscriptionId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: The property gets or sets the subscription identifier of a subscription to cancel. This property is required. This is a read/write property.
Docs.value: The property returns a GUID that represents a subscription identifier.

remarks.para: Get the from the Subscribe operation or the GetEvents operation response.
